h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Battle - Red Loong
content: With enough sustained damage, you can eventually stagger and knock down the Red Loong, which is your big moment to maximize your damage output.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Red_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Red Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Battle - Red Loong'.
The content is as follows:
With enough sustained damage, you can eventually stagger and knock down the Red Loong, which is your big moment to maximize your damage output.
